content: blue bug bookmark skill level beginner materials few yards cotton sport or dk-wt yarn sample shown in tahki cotton classic size g/6 4 25 mm crochet hook glue-on googly eyes gauge not important for this project terms/abbreviations back loop only blo beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hook hk repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet skip skip slip_stitch sl st stitch st bookmark head chain 4 join into ring then chain 3 work 11 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 do not fasten off 12 double_crochet tail chain 50 work 3 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hk and in ea of next 8 chain to form curly end of tail slip_stitch in next chain fasten_off and weave in ends glue on googly eyes copyright 2017 2008 kathy north -- www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 1
